title: Sandro Luís Zamboni Britzke
text:
Sandro Luís Zamboni Britzke (born February 20, 1978) is a former <a href="Brazil">Brazil</a>ian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Playing career.
In 2000, Luís joined Japanese <a href="J2%20League">J2 League</a> club <a href="Ventforet%20Kofu">Ventforet Kofu</a> which finished at the bottom place in <a href="1999%20J.League%20Division%202">1999 season</a>. However he could not play many matches and Ventforet finished at the bottom place for 2 years in a row.
